actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act to modify the pesticide registration process, and for other purposes.
short_title: EPA Transparency for Agriculture Products Act of 2022

summary.text:
EPA Transparency for Agriculture Products Act of 2022

This bill modifies the rulemaking process of the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) with respect to pesticide registration, revises the EPA's Science Advisory Panel to require additional nominees, and requires review of certain panel decisions or advice.

titles.title: EPA Transparency for Agriculture Products Act of 2022
EPA Transparency for Agriculture Products Act of 2022
A bill to amend the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act to modify the pesticide registration process, and for other purposes.
